M

main(String[]) - Static method in class it.uniba.main.AppMain
* This is the main entry of the application.
Match - Class in it.uniba.game
Class representing a chess match
Class type : < Control >

Responsibilities :
Knows :
The current status of the ChessBoard Captured pieces by each player The history of the moves The current player Does :
Parsifies the move given an input string Establishes whether the move is a Castling, a Capture or a simple one Checks whether the established move is legal and not ambiguous Executes the move, if legal Updates the status of Pawns, Rooks and Kings in order to say if the former can be captured en passant, or the latter can execute Castling Records the captures done by the players Updates the color of the current player according to the flow of the game
Match() - Constructor for class it.uniba.game.Match
Constructor of the class Match It initializes the currentPlayer to WHITE and creates a new ChessBoard with the pieces at the initial position of a classic chess game.
MatchException - Exception in it.uniba.game
Exception raised from the class Match in case of game errors
Class type : < no ECB >

Responsibilities :
Knows :
Does :
MatchException(String) - Constructor for exception it.uniba.game.MatchException
Constructor for the class MatchException.
MAX_COL_KING_REVERSE - Static variable in class it.uniba.game.Constants
 
MAX_ROW_KING_REVERSE - Static variable in class it.uniba.game.Constants
 
Move - Class in it.uniba.game
Class representing a generic move converted from the string inserted by the user.
Move(Piece, Coordinates, Coordinates, boolean) - Constructor for class it.uniba.game.Move
Constructor for the class Move.
Move.Castling - Enum in it.uniba.game
Enumerated type used to represent the castling of the move.
MOVE_CAPTURE - Static variable in class it.uniba.game.Constants
 
MOVE_COLUMN_OFFSET - Static variable in class it.uniba.game.Constants
Number of characters from the end of the move where the ending column char can be found.
MOVE_ROW_OFFSET - Static variable in class it.uniba.game.Constants
Number of characters from the end of the move where the ending row char can be found.
